original: pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ, padako, veyyākaraṇo,
corrected: pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsa pañcamānaṁ padako veyyākaraṇo
santi bhāradvāja eke samaṇa brāhmaṇā anussavikā

original: Iti yādiso ahaṁ tādiso tuvaṁ, yādiso tuvaṁ tādiso ahaṁ.
analyzed: iti yādisaḥ aham tādisaḥ yādisaḥ tuvam tādisaḥ aha
corrected: iti yādisaḥ aham tādisaḥ tuvam yādisaḥ tuvam tādisaḥ aham

original: ‘na kālaṅkato samaṇo gotamo, nāpi kālaṁ karoti;
analyzed: na samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ na api kālam karoti
corrected: na kālaṅkato samaṇo gotamo na api kālaṁ karoti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma oṭṭhapadaṁ; evamevassu me ānisadaṁ hoti tāyevappāhāratāya;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma oṭṭhapade evam evassu me ānisadam hoti
corrected: seyyathā api nāma oṭṭhapadaṁ evam evassu me ānisadaṁ hoti tāya eva appāhāratāya

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhāradvāja, ‘vaccaṁ vā muttaṁ vā karissāmī’ti tattheva avakujjo papatāmi tāyevappāhāratāya.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhāradvāja vaccam vā muttam vā karissāmi iti tattha iva avakujjaḥ papatāmi
corrected: so kho ahaṁ bhāradvāja vaccaṁ vā muttaṁ vā karissāmi iti tattha eva avakujjo papatāmi tāya eva appāhāratāya

original: Apissu maṁ, bhāradvāja, manussā disvā evamāhaṁsu: ‘kāḷo samaṇo gotamo’ti.
analyzed: apissu ma bhāradvāja manussāḥ disvā kāḷaḥ samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ iti
corrected: apissu maṁ bhāradvāja manussā disvā evamāhaṁsu kāḷo samaṇo gotamo iti

original: Ekacce manussā evamāhaṁsu: ‘na kāḷo samaṇo gotamo napi sāmo, maṅguracchavi samaṇo gotamo’ti;
analyzed: ekacce manussāḥ evam āhasu na kāḷaḥ samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ sāmaḥ samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ iti
corrected: ekacce manussāḥ evam āhasu na kāḷaḥ samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ na api sāmaḥ maṅguracchavi samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ iti

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhāradvāja, oḷārikaṁ āhāraṁ āhāresiṁ odanakummāsaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhāradvājaḥ oḷārikam āhāram odana kummāsa
corrected: saḥ kho ahaṁ bhāradvājaḥ oḷārikam āhāram āhāresiṁ odana kummāsa

original: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsiṁ.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati
corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ati abbhaññāsim

analyzed: ṭhānasaḥ mā ita bhāradvāja viditam yat idam
corrected: ṭhānaso me etaṁ bhāradvāja viditaṁ yad idaṁ
